nodes.text: Harp Allor was a human female from the planet Chandrila who lived during the era of the Galactic Empire. Sponsored by Winmey Lenz, a Chandrilan senior senator, Allor became a member of the Apprentice Legislature in 3 BBY. She was described by fellow Apprentice Legislator Princess Leia Organa as being friendly and over-prepared, and was one of several Apprentice Legislators to participate in a pathfinding class organized by Queen Breha Organa of Alderaan.
